name: Day Job Blob
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 submission

Theme: What home means to you

Play as Blob, a shape-shifting character that has to conform to the rigid geometry around him. Their world is judging and unwelcoming, but at home, Blob is free to be themself.

Credits

Code
Judie Thai

Art
Jen Tran
Sarah Barden
Ariana Williams

Music
